title: Fuel supply to return to normal from tomorrow: Minister
body_lines: Claiming that fuel supply was restricted during the last few days, Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara said today the required diesel and petrol stocks would be released to the market from tomorrow.
He told Parliament that supply of diesel and petrol was limited to 3,200 MTs of diesel and 2,800 MTs of petrol last few days from daily requirement of 5,400 MT of diesel and 3,400 MT of petrol.
He said 5,000 MT of diesel and 3,500 of petrol would be released to the market from tomorrow.
